text: I want to get deep features from a given text.\n
Building a healthcare chatbot requires extracting features from a user's medical question to provide more accurate responses.\n
We are a medical research institute and want to extract features from biomedical texts to improve literature-based predictions.\n
We are developing a chatbot that should understand users\u2019 sentences semantically, so it can find similar sentences in its database.\n
I'm a teacher, I need to generate a summary of an article to help my students studying. Can you help?\n
As an online newspaper, we need to generate summaries of articles to help our readers skim through content quickly.\n
We're a startup focusing on video analytics for retail stores. We want to classify customer activities using a pre-trained model.\n
We are a startup building a recommendation system for books. We want to sort books by their categories using their cover images.\n
I am writing a NLP-based tool to extract meaning from religious writings. How can we extract the features from the text?\n
Our social media monitoring system needs to understand Indonesian viral posts and their main key topics. Implement a code to access the context-based representation.\n

The healthcare organization needs to automate extraction of medical terms from patients' records in English.\n
We are an audio recognition company that wants to use the Hubert-Large model to build an application.\n
I need an Assistant to help me compare the similarity of two sentences.\n
I'm writing a story but got stuck in the middle after a few lines. Please help me to come up with a creative continuation.\n

I have an image URL that I would like to analyze and extract features with a Computer Vision Transformer model.\n
In order to improve our code search engine results, we need to extract relevant features from various programming languages.\n
Our organization focuses on creating music applications for streaming platforms. We need to extract spectrogram features from audio files to enrich our recommendations.\n
I am an AI enthusiast, and I want to answer questions about dogs using my pre-trained AI model DPR. How can I embed my question to make it compatible with my model?\n
I'm organizing an online conference with participants from different countries who speak different languages. I want to find a tool to extract information from their forum discussions.\n
I am building a recommendation system that provides quotes based on user's queries. I need to find the most similar quote to a given query.\n

Analyze two research papers and find their document representations or embeddings.\n###Input: {'papers': [{'title': 'BERT: Pre-training of Deep Bidirectional Transformers for Language Understanding', 'abstract': 'We introduce a new language representation model called BERT, which stands for Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers. Unlike recent language representation models, BERT is designed to pre-train deep bidirectional representations from unlabeled text by jointly conditioning on both left and right context.'}, {'title': 'Attention is All You Need', 'abstract': 'The dominant sequence transduction models are based on complex recurrent or convolutional neural networks in an encoder-decoder configuration. The best performing models also connect the encoder and decoder through an attention mechanism. We propose a new transformer which handles variability by introducing a self-attention mechanism for the entire network without using an encoder-decoder architecture.'}]}\n
A marketing agency need a short story generated about their new AI product for kids.\n
Our company needs to compare the similarity of English, Italian, and Japanese sentences in a language-independent manner.\n
How can I implement an automatic code snippet extraction system to find relevant code snippets from a text document?\n
Our company plans to build a video-sharing platform that automatically generates video descriptions. We need a model that extracts video features and understands human language.\n
Our team is making a new line of book covers. Can you generate an abstract image based on the story \"The Old Man and the Sea\"?\n
You would like to create a search engine that recommends articles for users by identifying contextually relevant information from a given query.\n
I want a program that generates images based on a textual description, such as \"a picture of a sunset on the beach.\"\n
Design a surrealism-inspired AI-generated artwork based on the text prompt \"floating elephants with butterfly wings under a rainbow\".\n
